discount_percentage.description: Discount percentage for the client level

id.description: Unique identifier of the cost category

type.description: Type of the cost category (e.g., 'Material', 'Labor', etc.)

is_active.description: Whether the cost category is active

created_at.description: Timestamp when the cost category was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the cost category was last updated

path.description: Относительный путь к изображению на сервере

url.description: Полный URL для доступа к изображению

is_main.description: Флаг, указывающий, является ли изображение основным

category_id.description: ID категории, к которой принадлежит опция

deleted_at.description: Дата и время удаления (если опция удалена)

id.description: Unique identifier for the production batch

product_variant_id.description: ID of the associated product variant

planned_quantity.description: The planned quantity for the production batch

status.description: The status of the production batch

total_material_cost.description: The total cost of materials used in the production batch

additional_costs.description: Any additional costs for the production batch

planned_start_date.description: Planned start date for the production batch

planned_end_date.description: Planned end date for the production batch

started_at.description: Actual start date of the production batch

completed_at.description: Actual completion date of the production batch

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the production batch

completed_by.description: ID of the user who completed the production batch

notes.description: Additional notes for the production batch

created_at.description: Timestamp when the production batch was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the production batch was last updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the production batch was deleted

order_id.description: Идентификатор заказа, с которым связано отправление
